definition: to condemn in speech and in writing (idiom)/to denounce by word and pen
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
to put (a criminal) to death/to punish
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to cut down/to fell/to dispatch an expedition against/to attack/to boast/Taiwan pr. [fa1]

sentences.english: The legislation, now under review, immediately came under heavy fire.
sentences.chinese: 目前正在審議的該法立即遭到大量的口誅筆伐。

sentences.english: The group has not appeared the Chinese soccer degenerates into the object which the media denounces in word and in writing.
sentences.chinese: 小組都沒出現的中國足球淪爲媒體口誅筆伐的對象。

definition: to slander/to smear/to vilify
misconception/fallacy
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
to attack sb by exposing faults/to denounce
harmful teachings/evil doctrine
not the least bit concerned/completely indifferent
traitor
to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions
law and order/rules and discipline
to drag sb before a public meeting to denounce, humiliate and physically abuse them (esp. during the Cultural Revolution)
to fight openly and maneuver covertly (idiom)
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
outward devotion but inner opposition (idiom); to pay lip service/to agree overtly, but oppose in secret
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
to contradict (elders or superiors)
variant of 小題大做|小题大做[xiao3 ti2 da4 zuo4]
